nodes.bodyText:
I think you want to still use the old form for this test since that's the deprecated version.
I would also change all the tests to deserialise to KeyValueServiceRuntimeConfig.class instead of the semi-concrete CassandraKeyValueServiceRuntimeConfig test to ensure we're doing the right thing everywhere
I think you need a new line at the end of the file, things seem to scream generally
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,3 +26,7 @@ sweep:
 
 internalSchema:
   targetTransactionsSchemaVersion: 1
+
+keyValueService:
+  type: cassandra
+  fetchReadLimitPerRow: 1000
